thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 81 of 1961
thread.title: Rick

author: Rick
title: Rick
text:
I only used a call out service as I had punctures on two wheels and could not drive to the local tyre garage. I think I may well be using Tyresonthedrive from now on.
Simple and easy to order online, was emailed on the day of fitting with a 2 hour slot. Chap called me 15 mins before he arrived, upon arrival he checked with me that what he was going to fit was what I ordered. Fitted all 4 tyres within 1 hour and asked me to check I was happy with his work.
Superb service, I will recommend your company to everyone I know.
